Text.Page:
At ease, soldier. We've got our hands and paws full at the moment, so an unattached soldier is a real boon.

I want you to find {@LinkCreature:223#1007$$Serelia} as quick as you can. He's in charge of field operations and needs assistance.

That's where you come in. Dismissed!

In from Velika? Welcome. We're always short of hands here.

No need to wait for me to give you work. Just dig in!
